trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi per costruire forme plurali e singolari di parole.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> che corrisponde alle regole del linguaggio applicate alle forme singolari e plurali delle parole.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> che applica regole del linguaggio che corrispondono all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> appena creato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> culture.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le impostazioni cultura <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica le regole del linguaggio da applicare ai singolari e plurali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: Valore da analizzare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la parola specificata è plurale.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the word is plural; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la parola è plurale; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> metodi possono restituire `true` per la stessa parola.

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, entrambi i metodi restituiscono `true` per la parola "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: Valore da analizzare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la parola specificata è singolare.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the word is singular; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la parola è singolare; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Sia il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> metodi possono restituire `true` per la stessa parola.

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, entrambi i metodi restituiscono `true` per la parola "fish".

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: Parola da rendere al plurale.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la forma plurale della parola specificata.

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: Forma plurale del parametro di input.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The word to be made singular.
trans-unit.target: Parola da rendere al singolare.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la forma singolare della parola specificata.

trans-unit.source: The singular form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: Forma singolare del parametro di input.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> classe applica le regole in lingua inglese per la creazione di forme singolare e plurale di parole.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Per estendere il servizio ad altri linguaggi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> sulla <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> classe.
